episodes.synopsis: To protect a dark family secret, Elaine agrees to have journalist Susan Berg follow her during the week of her son Douglas's engagement party.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: With the clock ticking, Elaine sends Bud to diffuse the Iranian hostage situation, throwing him back in the spotlight.
episodes.title: Second Time Around

episodes.synopsis: Tensions mount as Bud, Douglas and T.J. take an impromptu fishing trip to visit a pollster in order to gauge election standings.
episodes.title: The Woman Problem

episodes.synopsis: After a grueling overseas tour, Elaine returns to D.C. to find the country in a diplomatic crisis.
episodes.title: Lost Boys

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of T.J.'s overdose, Elaine finds herself torn between staying by her son's side and handling the rescue of a Chinese submarine.
episodes.title: 16 Hours

episodes.synopsis: President Garcetti throws a wrench in Elaine's plan to resign from his cabinet, and tensions fly when her resignation letter is leaked to the Globe.
episodes.title: Resignation Day

video.title: Political Animals
video.synopsis: U.S. Secretary of State Elaine Barrish Hammond struggles to keep her family together while dealing with national crises and a ruthless journalist.
